title: Value at Risk (Parametric)
notes: This equation calculates parametric Value at Risk using the normal distribution

title: Sortino Ratio
notes: This equation measures downside risk-adjusted returns

title: Calmar Ratio
notes: This equation measures return per unit of maximum drawdown

title: Information Ratio
notes: This equation measures active return per unit of active risk

title: Jensen's Alpha
notes: This equation measures abnormal returns after adjusting for systematic risk

title: Incremental Value at Risk
notes: This equation measures the VaR contribution of a specific asset

title: Component Value at Risk
notes: This equation calculates the VaR contribution weighted by position size

title: Liquidity-Adjusted Value at Risk
notes: This equation adjusts VaR for liquidity risk

title: Ulcer Index
notes: This equation measures the depth and duration of drawdowns

title: Pain Index
notes: This equation measures the average pain per unit time during drawdowns

title: Gain-to-Pain Ratio
notes: This equation measures return per unit of pain experienced

title: Recovery Time
notes: This equation estimates the time needed to recover from a drawdown
